article_title: Obamacare Won't Create A Shortage Of Doctors. That Doesn't Mean You'll Have Access To Them

article_metadata.description: Yesterday I testified before the House Ways & Means Health Subcommittee, arguing that Obamacare is going to restrict your access to providers. No, in all likelihood, you can’t keep your doctor. I found one Obamacare health plan that offers access to only seven pediatricians for a county with 260,000 children. Another Obamacare [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
